title: Trump to order alien files released
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he's ordering release of alien and UFO files after Barack Obama's comments sparked renewed interest.

title: Trump order prioritizes glyphosate under Defense Act
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed an executive order prioritizing U.S. production of glyphosate, citing national security, food security and military needs.

title: ‘A lot of drama.’ What to expect at big Trump-governors White House showdown
shortDescription: Four-letter words. 'See you in court.' Why the annual bipartisan meeting of governors is getting increasingly political.

title: Trump declares glyphosate production a national defense priority
shortDescription: President Donald Trump in an executive order prioritized production of controversial herbicide glyphosate, subject of lawsuits linking it to cancer.

title: Trump on Fulton County raid during Georgia event
shortDescription: President Trump commented on the FBI seizure of ballots in Fulton County during a speech in Georgia.

title: Trump stumps in Georgia to replace his nemesis, says he 'solved' affordability
shortDescription: Trump arrived in Rome, in Georgia's 14th congressional district, ahead of the March 10 special election to replace Greene, who resigned from her seat.

title: Trump blasts Obama over alien remarks
shortDescription: Trump claims Obama disclosed classified information after remarks about aliens however, Obama later clarified he saw no evidence of aliens.

title: Trump says Iran has 10 days to reach deal over nuclear program
shortDescription: Trump said the world would know in 10 or 15 days whether Iran would reach a deal to avoid military action over its nuclear program.

title: After Obama says they're real, Trump orders release of government files on UFOs
shortDescription: "He gave classified information, he's not supposed to be doing that," Trump told reporters Feb. 19 in discussing Obama's comments on aliens.

title: Trump calls Andrew arrest a 'shame'
shortDescription: When asked about Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor's arrest, President Donald Trump called it a "shame."

title: Trump says he ended 8 wars at Board of Peace meeting. Which ones?
shortDescription: President Donald trump said at the Board of Peace he solved eight wars in his first year in office. What wars is he referring to? It doesn't equal 8.

title: Abigail Spanberger, Alex Padilla to give Trump SOTU rebuttal
shortDescription: Virginia Gov. Abigail Spanberger will give Democrats' response to the State of the Union. California Sen. Alex Padilla will give a Spanish rebuttal.

title: Arts panel OKs White House ballroom despite 99% negative comment
shortDescription: The Commission of Fine Arts unanimously approved a plan for a 90,000-square-foot White House ballroom on Feb. 19.

title: See what Trump said about Atlanta, Herschel Walker and more in speech
shortDescription: In a speech at the Black History Month Reception at the White House, President Trump talked about Jesse Jackson, Atlanta and Herschel Walker.

title: Trump announces $10 billion for Board of Peace
shortDescription: International delegates who gathered to discuss next steps in a fragile Gaza ceasefire deal were given MAGA-style USA red hats.

title: Trump jokingly threatens to fire Rubio over success at Board of Peace
shortDescription: Trump joked at the inaugural Board of Peace meeting that he might fire Secretary of State Marco Rubio over his success following a European speech.

title: Gov. Wes Moore was snubbed by Trump for annual governors’ dinner | The Excerpt
shortDescription: In exclusive, Gov. Wes Moore gets candid about Democrats path forward.

title: What is Trump doing in Rome, GA? See his scheduled appearances
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is continuing his domestic tour to talk about the economy and affordability. On the schedule for Feb. 19 is Rome, Georgia.

title: 'Brainwashed': Marjorie Taylor Greene-Trump split looms over Georgia election
shortDescription: Trump is looking to reassert dominance while waging war against detractors, such as Marjorie Taylor Greene, during the 2026 primary seasons.

title: Wes Moore didn't seek war with Trump — but he's embracing the fight
shortDescription: After finding himself at the center of a high-profile skirmish with President Donald Trump, Maryland Gov. Wes Moore is leaning into the clash.
